overview.en: LOVE Chain uses blockchain technology to link the upstream and downstream business of the marriage and love industry, and build a complete and effective marriage and love ecosystem system, so that the value of quality users can be freely transferred in different businesses.
overview.zh: LOVE Chain利用区块链技术将婚恋产业的上下游业务链起来，构建一个完整有效的婚恋生态链系统，让优质用户的价值能够在不同的业务中自由流转。
